meanings.definition: The process of making copies using a xerographic machine.
meanings.sent1: Xerographies are created by a special machine.
meanings.sent2: The office had many xerographies of important documents.
meanings.sent3: The xerographies piled up so high that they reached the ceiling!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a xerographic machine, duplicating memories with precision.
meanings.sent5: The xerographies hummed quietly, producing exact replicas of the original.

meanings.definition: Copies made using a xerographic machine.
meanings.sent1: I need to make more xerographies of this report.
meanings.sent2: The quality of xerographies has improved over the years.
meanings.sent3: The xerographies were so clear, they looked better than the originals!
meanings.sent4: His words echoed through the room like xerographies of the past.
meanings.sent5: The xerographies lined the walls, each one a mirror image of the next.
